name: Field Capture
description: Mobile phone-based area tracing and quick map corrections while walking the course.

prd.problemStatement: Course features change over time and initial maps may have inaccuracies. Field capture enables superintendents to trace boundaries and make corrections on-site.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to trace areas while walking so that I can update my map accurately
As a superintendent, I want to make quick corrections so that my map stays current
